item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Martin McDowell DrVetMed ISFM AdvCertFB MRCVS and I am a fully qualified veterinary surgeon in Herefordshire, UK. I have also been involved with the WVS in January 2015 with veterinary voluntary work at the Carriacou Animal Hospital. Read more on my personal blog here â†’ I am have gained the ISFM Advanced Certificate in Feline Behaviour (ISFM AdvCertFB) with distinction. RCVS No. 6441157 Years practicing: 16

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Martin and I started this blog in about 2006. The OK Go post was my very first. It was on Google’s platform Blogger. I then migrated to Wordpress on different service providers: Bluehost, Webhosting UK and OVH. I finally broke free of Worpdress and moved to a static website platform. Hugo in this case. The CDN is hosted by Netlify, the photos are hosted on AWS S3 and the domain managed by Cloudflare.
